text: Short hair, no matter, Kim Kardashian and Khloe Kardashian are no strangers who change their looks. And this weekend was no different, as the couple decided to show a much shorter haircut than the fans also used. While visiting the City of Hope Poker Tournament at the Forum in Inglewood, California, Sunday afternoon, the Keeping Up with the Kardashian's stars ` ` Mothers with Bobs,'' Kim told Instagram Stories as she caught a selfie with her sister. ` ` You look really skinny,'' the woman behind NPP Beauty added as she praised Khloe's look for the event. SPW / SplashNews. com Kendall Jenner, Kris Jenner, Corey Gamble and Malika Haqq also participated
